name: Parkour: Epic Freerunner 3D
description:
The most awesome parkour freerunner race you will experience.It requires skills to remember which stunts you should perform during the level. 

How to Play:

Choose the appropriate stunt action and race to first to win the challenge!!!

Vault over or Duck under the obstacles which are on your way, kick the bad guys or even punch them, dive into the pool, do a wallrun, slide in the slopes, swing like a spider-man, and many more STUNTS!!!

Game Specifications:

30+ Astonishing characters/skins for you to encounter with unbelievable stunts.

Upgrades are the new way to gear up your need for power and get to action.

Satisfying Slo-Mo action for perfectly timed stunt.

Dummy opponents to race your parkour skills.

Colorful environments, so there is never a dull moment you will be able to feel.

That's incredible right? 

Now, lets parkour!
